comments.comment:
Im streaming NOW for a few hours: 
https://youtu.be/WizPqD0A83g
"you are maidenless" really calling out gamers with that one
This is giving me nostalgia. I remember  watching his Dark Souls playthroughs multiple times back in the day.

I’m not sure if Sive’s editing adapted hard, or Felix himself edited this one, but the classic Pewds souls play through vibes hit like a truck. Helped remind me of a simpler time. Hopefully he’ll edit & upload all the streams as well, giving me another bingeable playlist
The 0 death king has come to reclaim his crown once again.
It’s so weird seeing normal let’s plays again. I support it greatly!
Love how Felix goes to the boss as a farmer, with a pointy stick
Im sure he will keep his clean sheet. Its impressive that he never died in any videogame, including the ones he played blindfolded and controling with his feet. Realy impressive.
" a good old sneak behind stab in the ass attack " it got me laughing and felt so nostalgic. I do that most time when the game is pretty hard in the starting
This is from the deepest part of my heart, I really appreciate your effort.
Hey man. Even without editing it's totally fine too. Seeing one of my favorite content creators just genuinely enjoying themselves gives me satisfaction too
This is crazy, It really great to see the amount of people that cover this game because it's really good. Great video!
A moment of peace in this crazy world, thanks pewds
Seeing Jörgen again really brought a tear to my eye
I wouldn't mind a longer playthrough from Pewds with Elden Ring. This editing is good too because it removes the long time farming but if you can do 20 mins videos, that will be awesome. ️
The “you, you’re finally awake” played exactly after an advert, I was annoyed initially at yet another ad but that was good comedic timing, worth it
I’m one of those FromSoft fans who’s in it for the exploration, not the bosses. So to hear how big a role exploration plays in Elden Ring is so fraking exciting!

Im one of thousands of comments, but with the recent events and all the sadness throughout the world. This series comes at the perfect time. Thank you PewDiePie for lightening up a bleak few months for us all.

“This horse can double jump, it’s like a goat!”
-Felix Kjielborg
Sive is now the Elden Ring of editors. I used to dislike his style, but my goodness, the dude adapted.

0 Deaths special like always
Felix: Doesnt COUNT!

Just a friendly reminder Felix was able to defeat the Dark souls series and Sekiro without death.
Elden Ring has got nothing on him
Every zero deaths play through is zero disappointments!!!
He has come again , the Chosen One , the man with 0 deaths , still reigning high .

I stayed home sick from school one day and it just so happened that Pewds was playing his Dark Souls 3 Zero Death walkthrough when the game first dropped. One of the best 4 hours of my adolescent life and I don't even know why. This is so nostalgic right now.
Bro the amount of memories this video brought back to me gave me goosebumps the zero death playthrough was always amazing
4:48 this meme is so accurate
7:30 Blood Meridian Reference , nice.
Was waiting for this to be out once I saw an ad explaining about Elden Ring and was intrigued about it, that's why I'm here watching your playthrough of it!
You better finish this series bro, I love it when you play games like these
This brings me back to the Souls playthroughs, some of my favourites, AND you did them all with 0 deaths. A legend
pewdiepie was the one who got me into dark souls its been 8 and half years on and im still here
The “have you heard of the high elves” cracked me up man
YES I AM HERE FOR THE 0 DEATHS!

Pewdiepie: "I'm retired"
Also pewdiepie: "This video is sponsored by..."
God this really reminds me of when he first got into souls/borne games. Such a nice treat to see.
This game is amazing. I’ve played for 7 hours so far and have traversed completely different areas than Felix.

When i see these type of Pewdiepie videos i get nostalgia and then i go to the old ones of dark souls, then i realize how many years have been since then, after that i sit down, lie on my back and think where have all these years gone while im crying like a little princess
The editor really put his mind into this video and sync with Felix making jokes and really related to the topic which makes it entertaining
Pewds is our mentor. I learned so much from him I am on 0 deaths still ! Unbelievable !
Waited for this series more than for the game itself!

I really don’t know if I should watch this, because I really want to be unspoilt about the game. But at the same time; it’s a pewds gameplay video.
Truly the duality of Man

Pewdiepie was the one to get me into the souls games as a baby in highschool with his great Bloodborne videos. I used to watch them over and over again and I've now played through all of the souls-borne series multiple times. So, I'm seriously excited to watch these too! Also, was that Steve Blum at 10:40
7:29  "Anything that exist without me knowing, exist without my per-MISSION!!" Sir Pewdeath of Pie. I'm gonna start saying this for any hot/kill mic.
7:05 finally PewDiePie knows the Genghis Khan maneuver
i've been waiting for a classic pewdiepie gameplay video like this for so long

Pewds: He can heal?! That's illegal!
Also Pewds 1 sec later: drinks healing potion
it’s impressive how he actually beat the strongest boss in Elden Ring, Soldier of God, Rick on his 1st try.
damn havent seen pewds do a playthrough in a long time
I wasn't ready
Yeeees I loved the Dark Souls videos back in the day. Can't wait to watch this series! I hope he goes through to the end!
This has to be my favorite edits in a video. The editing is chef's kiss
This video feels very nostalgic in some moments. Reminded me of when I first started watching pewds
2:01 Pewds thinking “let’s see what sive can come up with”
8:34 is there something you're hiding from us Pewds XD
Watching him not understand incantations and just using the starting spear as a prophet is giving me so much stress, I love it

I remember your first dark souls play through back in the day, I waited every day for a new video in that series. It was the reason I tried the game for the first time and how I got completely hooked on it. Can't wait to play Elden Ring myself, have fun Pewds
This is the video I‘ve been waiting for! Love the gameplay+editing! Please keep them coming
I feel like pewds makes anything so interesting LOL Love ur vids
0 maidens, 0 deaths. This man can’t be affected by simpery
Finally you are playing a game, and a masterpiece at that.
Love seeing play throughs from Pewd! Made my day :)
Honestly, that sponsored ad by pewdiepie for OperaGX was the best ad I've see in a long time.  It actually made me want to uninstall it and reinstall it just for him.
My hat is absolutely OFF to Sive! These edits were magical.
This game is so hard lol! Good luck
It just makes me so happy to see you play and enjoy this. Don’t need heavy edits or anything

This game is a lot easier to begin with
Tree sentinel: Allow me to introduce myself

Pewds you’ve done it again. 
I already knew I would like this video before I even watched it. Glad to see you’re doing a play through for a highly anticipated GOTY. Let’s get it brooooooooooooooo
So hyped for this game!
The editing is really good! Already started to maniacally laugh 2 minutes in
This is my first time watching pawdiepie and the first second is gold
Love the lets plays brings me back keep going pewds
Been a while since i have laughed this much during a video xD the editing was on point!
I just love that it seems like a culmination of all their games from the last 13 years with an open world inspired by BOTW. Can't wait to play for the next six days
Wasn’t expecting the blood meridian reference 7:30

There must be an achievement for the ones who fight a boss with a pointy stick like him XD

Good video, had many 2016 vibes
Duuuude. This is gonna be great!
Never thought I would see a 0 death...
